testcase.name: Login
testcase.system-out: Given I have cleared the database...........................................passed Given I have registered as user "john" with password "john", name "john" and with address "Colourful St".passed Given I've moved to the login page..........................................passed When I fill the login form with username "john" and password "john", and I submit it.passed Then I should see the accounts-list page....................................passed
